name: Home
title: Home
body: This is my home page for testing ideas built using Solid JS. This may change at times as I experiment with ideas I have.
The source code for this site is available on this GitHub repository.

name: About
title: About Me
body: I am a BSc (Hons) graduate who has been confident working with computers in some way for most of my life.
I have around 13 years experience in software/web development primarily using PHP but also JavaScript at times.

name: Interests
title: My Interests
body: I develop new code ideas as a hobby in my spare time, actively keeping a check on new languages.
I keep up to date with music and play musical instruments including the guitar. I've previously uploaded some music I made on YouTube.
